name: Legendary Hunter VR
description: Legendary Hunter VR is a VR duck hunting game inspired by the old classic NES game Duck Hunt. Hunt Duck during the day time while surviving vicious crow attacks .And survive the wolves and the crocodiles at night . Enjoy the day / night cycles with dynamic weather and atmospheric surround sound .
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 sp1 x64 , Win 10 x64 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 sp1 x64 , Win 10 x64 Processor: i7 4790K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
